derivation: strengthened from the base of G5157 (στρέφω);
kjv_def: convert, turn (again, back again, self, self about)
strongs_def: to twist, i.e. turn quite around or reverse (literally or figuratively)
outline:
1. to turn, turn around
  2. to turn one's self (i.e. to turn the back to one
    1. of one who no longer cares for another)
    2. metaph. to turn one's self from one's course of conduct, i.e. to change one's mind
